name: Habitusnet Consulting AG
overview:
Habitusnet is a small group of business technology consultants, project managers and IT support professionals with a passion for helping small and medium-sized companies to get real value from the constant advancement in computer, communication, VoIP telephone and over all information technology systems.

We believe in:

  • Sustainability and corporate responsibility
  • Respect for each other, transparency and openness in everything we do and the need to develop sustainable business for us and our clients.
  • Taking responsibility for our choices and what we do â€“ being accountable.
  • Looking at the long term and not accepting measures that sacrifice tomorrow for a short term gain.
  • Keeping things as simple as possible and as relevant as possible

The future matters So does: the environment, our society â€“ especially for the next generation â€“ and our family lives.
